Event.name: Temporary_transfer_scenario
Event.definition: <def-root>In this scenario, the <fen>Theme</fen> begins in possession of the <fen>Lender</fen> and ends up in the possession of the <fen>Borrower</fen>, with the expectation that the <fen>Borrower</fen> will return the <fen>Theme</fen> after a <fen>Duration</fen> of time. </def-root>

Arg.name: Theme
Arg.definition: <def-root>The object that is transferred from the <fen>Lender</fen> to the <fen>Borrower</fen> for a <fen>Duration</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Lender
Arg.definition: <def-root>The person or institution who gives the <fen>Theme</fen> to the <fen>Borrower</fen> for a <fen>Duration</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Borrower
Arg.definition: <def-root>The person or institution who receives the <fen>Theme</fen> from the <fen>Lender</fen> for a <fen>Duration</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Duration
Arg.definition: <def-root>The amount of time in which the <fen>Borrower</fen> has possession of the <fen>Theme</fen>.</def-root>
